name: Lost in the Desert (JoeEnt)
description:
Story:

An Alien called Looshik is stuck in the middle of an canyon because his Jetpack is broken, so he needs to find another way up.

Gameplay:

Play the alien Looshik and jump over cliffs and use bounce plants to reach higher places. On your way up you will also have to complete little riddles to get further.

Controlls: Keyboard and Mouse:

Walk: W,A,S,D
Camera: Mouse
Jump: Space
Interact: E
Respawn to last Checkpoint: K

Controller (PS/XBOX):

Walk: Left Stick
Camera: Right Stick
Jump: X / A
Interact: Square / X
Respawn to last Checkpoint: Triangle / Y

Credits:

Created with: Unreal Engine
Sounds edited with: Reaper
3D Models made with: Blender
Visuals made with: Photoshop

Epidemics Sound
